title: One pot synthesis of 5-hydroxyalkylated thiadiazine thiones: Implication in pain management and bactericidal properties

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Asma Gul, Sobia Ahsan Halim, Ajmal Khan, Rasool Khan, P.A.N. Xian-Dao, Salman Zafar, Noor Akbar, Afnan Jan, Abdullatif Bin Muhsinah, Anar Gojayev, Ahmed Al-Harrasi
